title: Slow Shear Waves Defy Physics In New Holographic Simulations
desc: Researchers have discovered a novel, unusually slow shear mode in simulated materials exhibiting strong interactions, revealing a departure from typical fluid behaviour and offering a new avenue for understanding anomalous transport phenomena.

title: Simplifying library prep: All in a day’s work for Louise Fraser
desc: As Fraser and her team prepare for the launch of Illumina’s constellation mapped read technology, she looks back on a nearly 20-year career

title: Jill Zarin Stunned Over Sudden Firing From E! Over Halftime Show Opinion
desc: Jill Zarin is struggling to process her sudden firing from E!'s upcoming reunion series "The Golden Life" and TMZ has learned she feels blindsided by the fallout.

title: Turbulence warning was not relayed to plane before flight attendants were seriously injured
desc: Pilots aboard a United Airlines flight where three flight attendants were seriously injured were not warned about turbulence reported by a plane in front of them, the National Transportation Safety Board concluded Tuesday.

title: trick on starting debut in English Championship for Norwich
desc: Mohamed Toure moved to England recently on a $5 million deal and it is already looking like a great decision for the 21-year-old forward.

title: QC human milk bank serves recipients from neighboring cities
desc: QUEZON City Mayor Joy Belmonte on Tuesday said that the majority of the beneficiaries of the Quezon City Human Milk Bank (QCHMB) in 2025 came from neighboring localities, including Bulacan.

title: Mike Burgess says alleged Bondi terrorists ‘went dark’ before attack
desc: Australia’s spy chief has revealed the accused Bondi terrorists “went dark” to prevent detection ahead of the alleged mass murder event during a Chanukah celebration in December.

title: Britney Spears sells rights to music catalog for undisclosed sum, say reports
desc: Music publisher Primary Wave said to have bought rights to pop star’s music, including Toxic and Baby One More Time

title: Australia Day Honours recognise leaders tackling diabetes across Australia
desc: Australians working across diabetes care, endocrinology, vascular medicine and First Nations health have been recognised in the 2026 Australia Day Honours.

title: New video shows Mike Perry and Eddie Alvarez getting into wild brawl at BKFC event; Alvarez adds ‘It was deserved’
desc: Mike Perry got involved in a wild brawl at BKFC KnuckleMania VI with past opponent Eddie Alvarez
